@gfyoung I add a test method to class TestRolling in test_window. 
The method is called 'test_constructor_with_timedelta_window_and_minperiods', using same dataframe as 'test_constructor_with_timedelta_window'.
with old window.pyx, this test will fail since the result_roll_generic is a all-nan dataframe
This is my first pull request, I'm not sure is this what you want?
@FXocena : This looks pretty good. You will need to address some style-checking errors here and add a `whatsnew` entry. Otherwise, it looks great!
ok pushed a commit. this can be merged on green.
